title: Christmas Lights should be up ALL winter!
description: Winter in the midwest is long and gray.  Christmas lights would lift the spirit for many people

title: Charles Dicken's 'A Christmas Carole' is an all time classic
description: I believe that 'A Christmas Carole' is Charles Dicken's best work.  It has adventure, love, hope, and excitement!

title: Stop scrolling the internet.....it's a waste of time
description: Spending more time on the internet scrolling is not only a waste of time, but affects your health.  Sleep studies show people who scroll more, sleep less deeply than those who spend less time on the internet.

title: Dogs are much better than cats!
description: Dogs are truely man's best friend!  Not only do dogs listen to instructions better, but they travel, go for walks, and are intune to empathetic feelings.

title: Aliens are real!
description: I saw an alien!  I was stargazing last night and I saw a large, bright blob.  I focused my telescope even more and the object had moved!  I am convinced it was a spaceship!
